alert.note: Alert for Holmes; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 02 at 4:02PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Holmes and north central Washington Counties through 330 PM CDT... At 301 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Bonifay. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bonifay, Caryville, Westville, Brock Crossroad, Five Points, Whitehead Crossroads, Hulaw, Poplar Head and Johnson Crossroads. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
